resources.string: Click the add button, and create goal according to your need, set sub-category and duration. You can switch from Heath category and Productivity category, under which both have different set of sub categories. After creating goals you will see them in your home page. You can update your daily progress after completing your goal to keep track. You can also edit and delete the goal, by pressing on the goal. After completing every goal, you will receive 100 coins. You can also create goals with one or two other users, and update progress separately to have a team experience.You can also set reminders by clicking the reminder button, in thr add goal section. You can also set the interval for the reminder. After each interval, you will get reminded by thrive. You can also delete the reminder if you want by going to all reminders section.

By clicking the focus button on the upper left side of the screen, you can create focus sessions, where you can set count down timers for any amount of time, and meanwhile, you can focus on some work, you can also pause and reset the session.
From the coins that you will earn, you can go to the shop and buy any of the avatars. And you can set any of them as your avatar.
Statistics will show you your performance for your current and previous goals.

You can search for public goals and users by searching with category, sub-category or user name or goal name. You can see the users public goals by clicking on their name, you can send friend request to them. They can either accept or reject it. You can see notifications for this by clicking the notification button.
